title: Destined
description: When you're thrown into the fiery pits of hell, will you fight for survival or will you let the flames burn you alive?At eighteen, Brenna Dalton has the whole world at her fingertips, dreaming of life and love with the only man she's ever wanted. She loses it all at the hands of a monster.Abel McKinney is the baddest of the bad. Trained to be stronger, braver, and smarter, his path is set for a career as a Navy SEAL. One mistake and his whole world is blown apart.Fate brings Abel and Brenna back together years later for a second chance at the love that was stolen from them.When the devil comes calling, will they fight the demons that still haunt them or be reduced to a pile of ash?
author: Kate Bailey
